replies.author: Daniel
replies.text: I can't believe our president is supporting a known criminal, oh I forgot he is one of them..

replies.author: Brett
replies.text: It's pretty bad that wikileaks has become our main source of news.

replies.author: Justin
replies.text: Just be thankful there are people out there willing to give us the truth. They did it with Bush and the Dems loved it. They are doing it with Hillary now they hate it. Life sucks Dems, get over it...can't always cry to get what you want!
